meanings.definition: To engage in a fight or quarrel.
meanings.sent1: The kids would often fisty over toys in the playground.
meanings.sent2: The neighbors fisty loudly about the property line.
meanings.sent3: The birds seemed to fisty over the best spot on the tree branch.
meanings.sent4: The two countries continued to fisty over the disputed territory.
meanings.sent5: The siblings would fisty over the TV remote every evening.
